description: Try our easy to follow Lychee Summer Fruit Salad With Ginger Syrup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lychee Summer Fruit Salad With Ginger Syrup
name: Lychee Summer Fruit Salad With Ginger Syrup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Slice mango, rockmelon and pineapple. Combine in a large bowl with lychees. Pour cold syrup over fruit and garnish with lime zest and mint leaves to serve.
Slice mango, rockmelon and pineapple. Combine in a large bowl with lychees. Pour cold syrup over fruit and garnish with lime zest and mint leaves to serve.
